Package bank

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Account
    The Account interface represents a single account.
    Bank
    The Bank interface describes the functionality of a bank.
    BankDriver
    The BankDriver interface is used to access a particular bank.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InactiveException
    The InactiveException is thrown when a bank transaction is called on an closed account.
    OverdrawException
    The OverdrawException is thrown when a bank transaction is called which would overdraw an account, i.e.
